segments.en: Dream of the Red Chamber: Zhiping Commentary Collated Edition
segments.ru: Сон в красном тереме: Издание с комментариями Чжияньчжая

translator_notes: 脂评汇校本 indicates that this edition collates commentaries from various Zhiping manuscripts (e.g., 甲戌, 庚辰).
research_notes: Confirmed title and edition type from standard literary references.
